string-array.name: motivationalMessages
string-array.item: You\'re fat, and you shouldn\'t! Run for it!
You can throw in the towel, or you can use it to wipe the sweat off of your face.
“Don\'t let fatigue make a coward of you.” - Steve Prefontaine
“If you train your mind for running, everything else will be easy.” - Amby Burfoot
“Running is about more than just putting one foot in front of the other: It is about our lifestyle and who we are.” - Joan Benoit Samuelson
“A runners creed: I will win; if I cannot win, I shall be second; if I cannot be second, I shall be third; if I cannot place at all, I shall still do my best.” - Ken Doherty
“Don\'t bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.” - William Faulkner
“You don\'t stop running because you get old, you get old because you stop running.” - Christopher McDougall
“Remember, the feeling you get from a good run is far better than the feeling you get from sitting around wishing your were running.” - Sarah Condor
“Runners just do it – they run for the finish line even if someone else has reached it first.”
